name: Green Bay Press-Gazette
title: How Contact Green Bay Press Gazette Staff And Customer Service
content: **About the Green Bay Press-Gazette: Contact information, staff directory** **Our diversity & inclusion efforts** Inherent to our mission of empowering communities, we are dedicated to delivering essential and trusted content with a commitment to unbiased journalism. As part of the USA TODAY Network, we adhere to the Principles of Ethical Conduct for Newsrooms. **Contact us** Call customer service: 877-424-5042 Call the newsroom: 920-431-8400 Email information, questions or story ideas:metro@greenbaypressgazette.com Report corrections: Our goal is to promptly correct errors. Email us atmetro@greenbaypressgazette.com. Please describe the error, where you saw it and either the date and page number or the web address. To submit a classified advertisement,clickhere. To place a display ad, clickhere. To submit an obituary, clickhere. To submit a letter to the editor: Email forum@greenbaypressgazette.com Mail: P.O. Box 23430, Green Bay, WI 54305 For more information,visit our Help Center **Newsroom directory** GREEN BAY PRESS-GAZETTE STAFF Rashad Alexander, trending/breaking news reporter Email: ralexander@gannett.com Vivian Barrett,public safety reporter Email: vmbarrett@gannett.com Jeff Bollier, business/development reporter Email:jbollier@gannett.com| Phone: 920-431-8387 |
